title: Trials Fusion: The Awesome MAX Edition (MULTI10) [FitGirl Repack
description:
::Information::


Release Date: July 15, 2015
Genres/Tags: Arcade, 3D, Motorcycles
Developer: RedLynx
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 67% of user reviews are positive (based on 1,032 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (SKiDROW)


::Repack Features::


Based on Trials.Fusion.Awesome.Level.Max.Edition-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-tdalme.iso (11,115,053,056 bytes)
Includes Trials Fusion original game (updated to the latest version) and 7 DLCs: Awesome Level MAX, After the Incident, Riders of the Rustlands, Empire of the Sky, Welcome to the Abyss, Fault One Zero & Fire in the Deep
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.4 to 7.2 GB)
Installation takes 20-30 minutes (depending on your system)
HDD space after installation: 11 GB
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
Repack by FitGirl
